p: Antioxidants, which are natural, such as total phenols, tocopherols and ascorbic acid were found to be in the ethanolic extract of BC in our study. However, folic acid was not detected. The TPC determined for the extract was 23.26 mg GAE.g −1. The extract was analysed by HPLC for their vitamin content (ascorbic acid, α-tocopherol and folic acid) and the total phenolic content which could cause the antioxidant activity. The data obtained from this analysis were given in Table 5. Ascorbic acid and α-tocopherol were found in lower amounts (1.87 and < 0.5 µg.g −1 respectively) in the extract.
